After you complete it, quickly log the urge and your mood, and note how helpful the action felt. Repeat this simple reset consistently for a week to build momentum toward a calmer, more controlled evening routine.

Then log your urge and mood to track how this reset helps. Consistently practicing this for a week can move you closer to your goal without overwhelming you.
